DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , randomize study compare local wound infiltration local anesthetic ( LA ) versus single injection TAP block ( ssTAP ) LA versus continuous TAP block ( TAP caths ) catheter LA treatment postoperative pain total abdominal hysterectomy ( TAH ) .
DOC.criteria: Scheduled undergo total abdominal hysterectomy Age ≥ 18 year . American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) physical status ≤ 3 Known coagulopathy Known allergy Bupivacaine morphine Contraindication Tylenol usage Medical condition contraindicate bupivacaine use Daily narcotic usage ≥ 2 week 20mg oxycodone daily equivalent .
